# password

**Instance Property**

The password used to encrypt or decrypt an archive.

## Declaration

```swift
var password: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.applearchive/documentation/AppleArchive/ArchiveEncryptionContext/generatePassword()] function to generate random high entropy passwords.

## Setting a password

- **generatePassword()**: Generates a new password.
- **setPassword(_:)**: Sets the password from the supplied string.

items.description: Sets the password from the supplied string.
